perk.name: Heroic Perk
perk.description:
`Arcane Renewal`

Whenever enemies burning with Arcane Fire take damage from any source, Adagio regenerates 25% of that damage as energy.
---
**Level 1-12 Stats**

abilityA.name: Ability A
abilityA.description:
`Gift of Fire`

Heals target ally, then splashes Arcane Fire onto nearby enemies. If Adagio heals himself, he'll also apply a heavy slow to nearby enemies.

Arcane Fire(status effect):
Burns the target every second & causes Adagio's other abilities to deal more damage.
---
*Burst heals the target instantly, followed by a gradual heal over the next few seconds.

Burst Heal is increased by 9% of Adagio's bonus health.

When cast on self, slows nearby enemies by 70% for 0.7s.

Resets basic-attack cooldown on activation.*
---
**Stats - Lv 1/2/3/4/5**

abilityB.name: Ability B
abilityB.description:

---
*Deals bonus damage to enemies afflicted by Arcane Fire.

Bonus damage is increased if Adagio casts this spell on himself.

Resets basic-attack cooldown on activation.*
---
**Stats - Lv 1/2/3/4/5**

abilityC.name: Ultimate
abilityC.description:

---
*Adagio temporarily gains fortified health while channeling.*
---
**Stats - Lv 1/2/3**

perk.name: Heroic Perk
perk.description:
`Infinite Reboot`

Instead of dying, Alpha initiates a 3.5s reboot sequence. If her reboot health is not destroyed before time runs out, she will return to life.

When alive, Alpha's special energy bar shows the time until Infinite Reboot is available. When rebooting, the bar counts down to when she will revive.
---
*Reboot health: 600-2600 (level 1-12) (+65% of bonus max energy)

Reboot duration: 3.5s

Alpha revives with her Prime Directive & Core Charge ability cooldowns refreshed.*
----
**Level 1-12 Stats**

abilityA.name: Ability A
abilityA.description:
`Prime Directive`

Alpha scans for enemies in front of her. If she scans an enemy hero, structure of jungle creature, Alpha dashes behind them & slashes all enemies within 4.5 meters.
---
*Deals bonus damage for each stack of Core Overload on Alpha.

Removes all negative effects of Core Overload.

Applies a brief slow to the scanned target.

Deals 50% less damage to minions.*
---
**Stats - Lv 1/2/3/4/5**

abilityB.name: Ability B
abilityB.description:
`Core Charge`
Alpha lunges forward & basic attacks her target. This ability costs 2% of her current health & applies Core Overload to herself, which will increase her damage output.
---
*Core Overload (status effect):
Each stack increases health cost of Core Charge by 2%, but also increases the damage. Also causes basic attacks to heal her. This healing is reduced against lane minions. Lasts 8s, stacking up to 3 times. Basic attacks refresh the duration.

Attack has a small AoE, hitting nearby targets for crystal damage.

Basic attacks reduce the cooldown of this ability.*
---
**Stats - Lv 1/2/3/4/5**

abilityC.name: Ultimate
abilityC.description:
`Termination Protocol`
Alpha starts her self-destruct sequence, exploding after 3s & then resurrecting herself with Infinite Reboot.
---

Upgrading this ability reduces the cooldown of Infinite Reboot.

Explosion radius: 4.5 meters.
---
**Stats - Lv 1/2/3**

perk.name: Heroic Perk

abilityB.name: Ability B

---

*Any time this ally takes damage, Ardan gains Vengeance.*
---
**Stats - Lv 1/2/3/4/5**

abilityB.name: Ability B
abilityB.description:

*Overdrive: At max rank, Blood for Blood deals an additional 15% damage.

**Stats - Lv 1/2/3/4/5**

---
*If Ardan leaves the perimeter, it is immediately destroyed.

**Stats - Lv 1/2/3**
